acme.util.time
Class PeriodicTaskStmt

java.lang.Object
  acme.util.time.TimedStmt
      acme.util.time.PeriodicTaskStmt

public abstract class PeriodicTaskStmt
extends TimedStmt

Encapsulates a unit of work to be performed at a specified interval. See Util.addPeriodicTask.
